title: What are the technologies used by doctors? - Quora

response.answer_text: Two things. My smart phone. It allows both communication, access to data, access to information, and I can turn it off anytime I want. It is a convenience which is within my control, that I can live with and without, based on my choice.My miniespresso (‘minipresso’) device. No batteries; just supply hot water and coffee to get a fantastic espresso PRN.Dr. Bertrand’s Patient Stories: A podcast dedicated to stories of being.

Human Technology which is myself ..Yes I trust myself best in this era of gadgets/computers ..and many more I have seen me working with computers shut down and many gadgets I would have otherwise relied on fail miserablly like the mobile for e.g. Good Question ! However I can take advantage of any gadget as a doctor when I can
